title: Design
description:
I edited the homepage and added a new one about the FTB Wiki Transition. I'm not sure If I like it but I can't edit anymore, as I have exams. Please finish if you can.

ps. I hate the orange. What color is the GT bronze machine one?

replies.body: Quickly reworded things because rewording.  What sort of other things did you want to see done with this?
Who thought that download was spelt dowload?
